title: Developmental Nursing Simulation Education for Infants with Congenital Heart Disease Surgery

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Education emphasizing multidisciplinary team-based approaches through collaborative learning, utilizing VR simulations to recreate actual CICU (Cardiac Intensive Care Unit) environments

learning_goals: Through collaborative learning team activities, explain three pain management protocols for infants undergoing congenital heart disease surgery
Establish developmental nursing plans by applying environmental setup (lighting, noise reduction, etc.), cue-based nursing, and family engagement strategies in VR simulations
Understand multidisciplinary team roles and collaborate with team members to implement individualized developmental nursing interventions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
